# [Story] ORB-041: Implement cross-platform attribution

## Parent Epic

Parent: #514 (Epic 3.2: Attribution Studio)

## Description

Implement cross-platform attribution to track customer journeys across organic and paid channels, social platforms, and multiple devices.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Track organic-to-paid conversion paths
- [ ] Map social media to website journey touchpoints
- [ ] Support multi-device attribution with user identity resolution
- [ ] Implement cookie-less tracking alternatives (fingerprinting, first-party data)
- [ ] Cross-platform journey visualization

## Technical Notes

- Implement identity graph for user resolution across devices
- Use UTM parameter tracking and referrer analysis
- Consider privacy regulations (GDPR, CCPA) in tracking implementation
